anyone know the difference between this and the USA version?

The serial you use determines the version of the software that is installed i.e. UK, CAN or ACADEMIC 

The keygen was created for an older build of business Plan Pro 2007 which is why the UK and CAN serials don't work anymore only the ACADEMIC serials work now.

Academic version seems to be exactly the same programme however only the same 60+ plans can be loaded into the sample plan window.

Use this link: 

ftp://ftp.bizplans.com/BPP2007samples.exe 

to download all the sample plans to your harddrive. Once they have been installed they can be found at: 

C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\Palo Alto Software
Thanks for the upload! and thanks zand108 for the link to the extra samples! :)

1. Open the KeyGen prog and click GenSerID (make sure you select 2007)

2. install the prog. using the generated serial #

3. go to "activate by phone" once installed

4. they will give you an Activation ID below the Serial #, cut and paste given Activation ID into the Activation ID section in the KeyGen program.

5. click GenConfID when both the Serial # and Activation ID spaces are filled.

6. cut and paste the conference number into the "Activate by Phone" window.

7. Listen to the music from the KeyGen program its so lame but i cant stop listening it reminds me of that game Uncharted Waters for NES

Installed samples. Cannot locate according to previous posts. Can someone shed some light..thx

Ok..In regards to additional BPP Samples downloaded.
If you haven't already downloaded, heres the link: ftp://ftp.bizplans.com/BPP2007samples.exe 

1. Run and install program BPP samples
2. locate samples folder C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\Palo Alto Software\9.0. 

Just a note: If you can't see the folder listed (as with the case with mine) Go to tools-folder options-view-click on show hidden files and click ok.

3.open folder "bppenu"

4. open "samples" folder

And there you have it! I counted 470 sample business plans. These are displayed in Bpp file format and PDF. If you click on BPP format, it will open it in app and you can edit it to your hearts content!!!

2. Use a PDF converter (link below). Done!
